short_summary: Establish a list of qualified suppliers for renting heavy construction equipment to various Federal Departments in Ontario
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Offerors may submit an offer at any point during the solicitation period.  Supply Arrangements will be issued in the order that compliant offers are received. Canada is seeking to establish a list of qualified suppliers capable of providing various pieces of rental heavy construction equipment (without operator) to various Federal Departments located in Ontario.

full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Heavy Construction Equipment Rental Contract

---

## Title
**E6TOR-23RM03 Heavy Construction Equipment Rental**

```
Title (English): E6TOR-23RM03 Heavy Construction Equipment Rental
Title (French): E6TOR-23RM03 Location d’équipement de construction lourd
```

## Solicitation Information
```
Reference Number:      WS4625503118
Amendment Number:      0
Solicitation Number:   WS4625503118
Publication Date:      2024-06-11
Tender Closing Date:   2024-06-30T14:00:00 ( **Extended Tender Closing Date**: Offers accepted at any point during the solicitation period)
```

## Opportunity Information
```
Procurement Category: SRV - Supply Arrangement
Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
Areas of Opportunity: Ontario (except NCR)
Relevant Industries: *22000000 - Building and Construction Machinery and Accessories
Relevant Agreements: *Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
                      *Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
                      *Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
                      *Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
                      *Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
                      *Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
                      *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
                      *Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
                      *World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
                      *Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
                      *Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
                      *Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
```

## Contracting Information
```
Contracting Entity Name:   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Contact Email:             david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Notices URL:               https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19982550?extsite=MTk5ODI1NTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
Attachments:               None
```

## Description
Canada seeks to establish a list of qualified suppliers capable of providing various pieces of rental heavy construction equipment (without operator) to various Federal Departments located in Ontario. Eligible suppliers may submit an offer at any point during the solicitation period.
